title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI or REST API; ships macOS/Linux/Windows binaries and a Go library.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party async/sync Python client; pip-installable, supports streaming, chat, embeddings and tool calling.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package giving LLM, chat, embeddings and tool-use components backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web dashboard (chat UI, model management, RAG, multi-user) installable via Docker.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library (Kotlin friendly) with sync/async APIs, Spring-Boot starter and GraalVM native-image support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that exposes Ollama chat & image-generation in servers with per-guild model settings.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module for CI pipelines that caches and serves Ollama models inside containers.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library wrapping the REST API with async/await and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client plus Axum example for embedding Ollama in apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 library with IAsyncEnumerable streaming, dependency-injection helpers and Blazor sample.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client generated from OpenAPI spec; includes cross-compilation example for aarch64-macos.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir OTP library with GenServer-backed connection pooling and LiveView chat demo.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to declaratively manage Ollama models and Modelfiles as code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack (deepset) integration offering OllamaGenerator, OllamaEmbedder and chat nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN processes for human-task summarisation.
